data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Viraktamath, C. A., Webb, M. D. (2014): Four new species of the grass feeding leafhopper genus Nicolaus Lindberg (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Deltocephalinae) from the Indian subcontinent. Zootaxa 3784 (5): 528-538, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3784.5.2
